text.more:
Network of topics, papers, authours and keywords from the submitted abstracts to the conference of the ACCC and FASN 2021. 
The papers were submitted to a certain  conference topic and the authours provided their own key words. 
The relative position of the nodes shows how related they are between them, the more connections between two nodes, the closer. 
Therefore papers from a topic will be arround it. For example, if there is only one paper treating a particular subject it will be away from the bulk. Those forming the bulk  are sharing common key-words or co-authoured by similar people.
